lead_paragraph: With tears streaming as he spoke of one day being reunited with the brother he lost in the terrifying chaos of the Democratic Republic of Congo's civil war, Popole Misenga showed the potential power of the Olympics' Refugee Team on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Pain and Pride of Refugee Team Shine Through Misenga's Tears
headline.main: Pain and Pride of Refugee Team Shine Through Misenga's Tears

snippet: With tears streaming as he spoke of one day being reunited with the brother he lost in the terrifying chaos of the Democratic Republic of Congo's civil war, Popole Misenga showed the potential power of the Olympics' Refugee Team on Saturday....
